activities: We collect information needed for billing purposes. Our customers also submit information about their company to be used on invoices, websites, and other materials that they will then give to their end-customers. We store this information on their behalf. They give this information to us when they sign up for an account. We also store information about our customers' end customers because they input that information in the course of using the software to create rental orders for their customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, contact person, email address, mailing address, phone number, fax, customer names, addresses, email addresses and phone numbers. All processed automatically
